title: Market Factors Explorer
description: Interactive tool to visualize factor exposures and performance across time with simple backtests.

title: ETF Screener
description: Lightweight screener to filter ETFs by fees, liquidity, and composition with client-side charts.

title: Options Volatility Surfaces
description: Uses y-finance options price data as input to the black scholes data to derive volatility. Axes: Volatility, moneyness, option price.
